issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Strong supporter of expanding access to affordable healthcare, advocating for lowering prescription drug prices and protecting coverage for pre-existing conditions

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, pathway to citizenship for undocumented immigrants, and protecting DACA recipients

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Advocates for aggressive climate change policies, supporting Green New Deal principles and renewable energy investments

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased federal funding for public education, student debt relief, and expanding access to community colleges and vocational training

issues.title: Infrastructure Investment
issues.description: Champions large-scale infrastructure investment, focusing on transportation, broadband access, and modernizing public infrastructure

issues.title: Gun Control
issues.description: Supports comprehensive gun control measures, including universal background checks and assault weapons ban

issues.title: Economic Equality
issues.description: Advocates for raising minimum wage, strengthening labor unions, and reducing income inequality
